actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Education to conduct a study to determine the best means of developing a national standard by which to measure the rate at which students drop out of secondary schools in the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: Accuracy and Uniformity in Dropout Rate Reporting Study Act

summary.text: Accuracy and Uniformity in Dropout Rate Reporting Study Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to study and report to Congress on the best means of developing a national standard by which to measure the rate at which students drop out of secondary schools in the United States.

titles.title: Accuracy and Uniformity in Dropout Rate Reporting Study Act

To direct the Secretary of Education to conduct a study to determine the best means of developing a national standard by which to measure the rate at which students drop out of secondary schools in the United States, and for other purposes.
